targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_recv), 1s)*count(packets_recv)/count(packets_recv) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE ("host" = 'Ripon' AND "interface" = 'enxf01e3414ede7') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_sent), 1s)*count(packets_sent)/count(packets_sent) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE ("host" = 'Ripon' AND "interface" = 'enxf01e3414ede7') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
